text: @GovernorTomWolf #covid19 ... for the hypnotized audience glued to the screens it was increasingly looking like a "Russian roulette" ... - now that tens (or hundreds?) of thousands lives were at stake ... their, spectators' lives... Excerpt from https://t.co/rKwTYAYiE1
